While Botulinum toxin ( BTX ) injection effective safe treatment spasticity child CP , insufficient evidence improvement motor function enhance participation population . Objective : To examine outdoor activity functional outcome follow low limb BTX child CP . Methods : In pilot study investigator use Global Positioning Systems ( GPS ) measure walk speed , distance , number walk event destination ambulatory child CP follow BTX injection lower limb ; age gender match sibling study control group . Outdoor activity measure 1 , 3 6 month follow BTX treatment compare baseline sibling . Outdoor activity correlate leisure activity preference quality life questionnaire . Significance : Improvement outdoor activity follow BTX injection pilot study assist construction large study evaluate participation quality life child CP .
